control_settings: Control your privacy settings and security options
two_factor_description: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy
scan_qr_description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
passkey_description: Use biometric authentication or security keys for passwordless login
browser_no_passkeys: Your browser doesn't support passkeys. Please use a modern browser like Chrome, Safari, or Edge.
email_change_description: Enter your new email and password to confirm the change. You'll receive a verification email at your new address.
password_change_description: Enter your current password and choose a new one
private_description: Only approved followers can see your posts
mentions_description: Let others mention you in posts and comments
health_metrics_description: Allow followers to see your weight, height, age, and fitness goals (hidden by default for privacy)
activity_description: Let others see when you're active
export_description: Download a copy of your Wellio data
delete_description: Permanently delete your account and all data
delete_warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
rename_passkey_description: Give this passkey a custom name to easily identify it.
backup_codes_description: Store these backup codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once if you lose access to your authenticator app.
verification_sent: Verification email sent! Please check your new email address to confirm the change.
toast_password_too_short: New password must be at least 6 characters
toast_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address
toast_different_email: New email must be different from current email
toast_account_deletion: Account deletion must be requested through support
toast_follow_prompts: Follow the prompts to add your passkey...
toast_failed_verify_2fa: Failed to verify 2FA code. Please try again.
toast_failed_disable_2fa: Failed to disable 2FA. Please try again.
data_access_description: These professionals have permission to view your wellness data
no_data_accessors: No one has access to your data
data_is_private: Your wellness data is completely private
cannot_see_note: They cannot see your raw logs, medical records, or private notes
revoke_access_description: {{name}} will no longer be able to see your wellness data. You can re-invite them later if needed.
